name: James Richard Odom
bio: When James Richard Odom was born on 15 December 1853, in Florida, United States, his father, Richard James Odom, was 28 and his mother, Nancy Parker, was 27. He married Susan Ware Moses on 15 August 1873, in Butler, Alabama, United States. They were the parents of at least 10 sons and 1 daughter. He died on 3 May 1926, in Oaky Streak, Butler, Alabama, United States, at the age of 72, and was buried in Kervin Cemetery, Red Level, Covington, Alabama, United States.
